alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 3:30PM MST until August 12 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE MANGUM FIRE SCAR BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 325 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that heavy rain had ended over the Mangum Fire scar. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain fell earlier this afternoon. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Mangum Fire scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Mangum Fire scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Coconino County This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Jacob Canyon and Warm Springs Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Mangum Fire scar. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
